mapper.select: SELECT WORK_DATE, BATCH_NO, REF_NO, RULE_CODE, DEPART_ID, RULE_TYPE, UNIT_NAME, UNIT_CODE, RELATION_TYPE , REPORT_DATE, SHADINESS_LEVEL, SHADINESS_DESC, ACTION_MEASURE, ORIG_BATCH_NO, ORIG_WORK_DATE, ORIG_CLIENT_ID , ORIG_REF_NO, ORIG_TRADE_DATE, ORIG_RULE_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, IF_RPT, RPT_STATUS, FINAL_RPT_STATUS, RET_MSE, REPORTER , RPT_FILE, RPT_ZIP, TOTAL_COUNT1, TOTAL_COUNT2, SERIAL_NUM_1, SERIAL_NUM_2, SERIAL_NUM_3, IS_DEL, DEL_INFO, MAKE_STATUS , MAKER, MAKE_TIME, CHECK_STATUS, CHECKER, CHECK_TIME, CHECK_INFO, FILLER1, FILLER2, FILLER3, SHADINESS_REP_NAME, SHADINESS_REP_IC_TYPE , SHADINESS_REP_IC_TYPE_MEMO, SHADINESS_REP_IC_NO, SHADINESS_SRD_NAME, SHADINESS_SRD_IC_TYPE, SHADINESS_SRD_IC_TYPE_MEMO, SHADINESS_SRD_IC_NO , RPT_COUNT, SHADINESS_TRPT_POINT, TRAN_CUST_BEHAVIOR, DOUBT_ANALYSIS, SHADINESS_CRIME_TYPE, SHADINESS_TRAN_CODE, RPT_DIR, O_RPT_DIR, O_TRPT_POINT , MAN_CORRECT_FLAG, RPT_DOT_CODE, SERIAL_NUM_4, SHADINESS_TRPT_POINT_MEMO, ORG_RPT_FILE FROM AML_ANALYSISRESULT WHERE 1=1 AND WORK_DATE = #{WORKDATE}
